text: Ta [an la] shuo:“A dan a! Ni ba zhexie shiwu de mingcheng gaosu tamen [tianshi] ba!” Dang ta [a dan] ba naxie shiwu de mingcheng gaosu tamen shi, ta [an la] shuo:“Nandao wo meiyou dui nimen shuoguo ma? Wo dique zhidao tiandi jian de yiqie wei jian zhi wu, wo dique zhidao nimen suo gongkai de he yincang de.”
